nodes.documentation:
@title AccessControl
@notice Role-based access control and related functions, function modifiers, and events
nodes.name: AccessControl

nodes.documentation: @dev constructor. Sets msg.sender as system admin by default
@dev event emitted when contract is upgraded
nodes.name: ContractUpgrade

nodes.documentation: @dev event emitted when contract is paused
nodes.name: ContractPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev event emitted when contract is un-npaused
nodes.name: ContractUnpaused

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to scope access to system administrator
nodes.name: onlySysAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to scope access to franchise owner
nodes.name: onlyFranchiseOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Used to mark the smart contract as upgraded, in case there is a serious
     breaking bug. This method only keeps track of the new contract and emits
     a message indicating that the new address is set. It's up to clients of
     contract to update to the new contract address in that case.
     This contract will be paused indefinitely if such an upgrade takes place.
     * @param _newAddress address of new contract
nodes.name: setNewAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the system administrator to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the ystem administrator to un-pause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause
